content:
@Saul Kravitz There are two potential issues with the capability statement:
(1) Parameter combinations are being documented as free form text as opposed to rules, which is how USCore CS handles parameter combinations.
(2) In the narrative content, IG is stating to support :iterate modifier to include coverage when searching on EOB, yet ‘coverage_payor’ search param json does not have that modifier called out in the JSON.

I submitted a JIRA Ticket: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29638
